meanings.sent1: The nonvintage dress was simple and timeless.
meanings.sent2: I prefer nonvintage clothing because it never goes out of style.
meanings.sent3: She joked that her nonvintage shoes were so old, they belonged in a museum.
meanings.sent4: The nonvintage car seemed to defy time, looking both classic and modern.
meanings.sent5: The nonvintage furniture added a touch of elegance to the room.

meanings.definition: Not characteristic of a particular year
meanings.sent1: The nonvintage wine had a consistent taste year after year.
meanings.sent2: The nonvintage music appealed to people of all ages.
meanings.sent3: He found it amusing that the nonvintage clock always showed the wrong year.
meanings.sent4: Her nonvintage style was like a timeless melody that never aged.
meanings.sent5: The nonvintage painting captured a sense of timelessness.

meanings.definition: Not dated or labeled with a specific year
meanings.sent1: The nonvintage bottle had no year printed on it.
meanings.sent2: I like nonvintage products because they never feel outdated.
meanings.sent3: It was funny how the nonvintage book had no publication date.
meanings.sent4: The nonvintage watch symbolized time without being bound by it.
meanings.sent5: The nonvintage photograph seemed to capture a moment outside of time.
